name: Sylvieâ€™s Lavender Lemonade
description: Inspired by a recipe developed by Linda Dowling from the Happy Valley Lavender Farm in Metchosin, BC.
preparation: Combine 2 1⁄2 cups water with sugar in Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium, stirring until sugar is dissolved.
Add the lavender, cover and remove from heat. Let steep at least 20 minutes (and up to several hours).
Strain mixture and discard lavender. Pour into a glass pitcher. Stir in lemon juice and remaining water.
Pour into tall glasses half-filled with ice, or refrigerate until ready to enjoy.
